name: Wildwood: A Town Building Game
description:
Welcome to Wildwood, the ultimate town building game! Start from nothing. Provide food and shelter for your citizens. Gather resources, research new technologies, and grow from a surviving settlement into a thriving one. Take advantage of the infinite procedurally generated world to expand your settlement as far as your heart desires.


Help your citizens thrive by building homes and workplaces for them. As you progress through the tech tree you will unlock new items and buildings that will help you in your quest to expand your settlement


The procedurally generated world of Wildwood is infinite. Explore new areas and take advantage of the resources available there. Expand your settlement as far as your heart desires and discover the endless possibilities of Wildwood.


Connect your settlement with a logistics network of trains and wagons. Move resources to where they are needed to ensure the survival of your settlement and to keep your citizens well provided for

Wildwood provides a unique challenge for players who want a survival city builder that allows you to endlessly expand your world. Start building your settlement today!
